- Transportation: Flight F3623834 from Myrtle Beach to Detroit, cost: $258 per person
- Breakfast: Not applicable (assumed departure from Myrtle Beach)
- Attraction: Detroit Riverwalk, Detroit
- Lunch: Southern Bliss Bakery, Detroit, cost: $28, cuisines: Tea, BBQ, Desserts, Seafood
- Dinner: A Dong Restaurant, Detroit, cost: $40, cuisines: Tea, Cafe, Pizza
- Accommodation: Cozy 1 bedroom in the heart of Fort Greene, Detroit, cost: $751, Entire home/apt

Number of people: 2
Total cost: 2 x $258 (flight) + 2 x $28 (lunch) + 2 x $40 (dinner) + $751 (accommodation) = $1,403
Accommodation minimum nights: 1/3
